full_summary:
# EB144-241720 B: CCGC Moving and Storage Contract

## Solicitation Details

* Title: Moving and Storage Contract for the Canadian Coast Guard College
* Reference Number: WS4408705823-4489289333
* Solicitation Number: WS4408705823
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: March 14, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: April 3, 2024, at 2:00 PM (objection to your 14:00 mistake!)

## Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard College (CCGC) is soliciting proposals for moving and storage services.

## Solicitation Type

* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Regional Information

* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: *Nova Scotia

## Contracting Entity

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contact Information

* Contracting Officer: Genevieve Petten (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: [genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Tender Documents

* Request for Proposal (RFP) and attachments can be accessed and downloaded from the SAP Ariba platform after logging in and completing your Government of Canada profile.

## Note

This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number EB144-241720/A dated February 2, 2024. A debriefing session will be provided upon request to offerors who bid on the previous solicitation.

Note: I’ve assumed the date for the tender closing from your original input. Verify this against the original file to ensure accuracy!
